item.description:
It's the end of the world ???  Well then lets go out Dancing ! Musgy will be playing. They are a great cover band. Here's a facebook link to check them out.

https://www.facebook.com/Mugsyband

Please join me for dinner  at 7 pm ( please ask for separate tabs ) then we can dance off the food around 9:30. It's a great way to distress  and who knows what may happen at midnight..lol   What happens at the Derryfield, stays at the Derryfield right ( unless someone sneaks in a camera..lol )? So Come on out for some FUN before the Big holiday!!!!

Let me know if you will be coming for dinner please. Post it in your rsvp.

My number if needed 315-0275

*** Please folks..I ONLY want to know if you ARE joining me. NO rsvp's only fill up my mailbox. Greatly appreciated , thanks !!! *****
item.how_to_find_us: I have reserved a table for 14 under Cindy..most likely to the left as you come in.
item.name: Dancing to Mugsy @ the Derryfield
